NewsArticle.Title: Nexon Store Open For Business
NewsArticle.Content: (Santa Clara, CA - November 19, 2001) Nexon has been bringing awesome online gaming experiences to players for years. Now, Nexon is bringing mugs, T-shirts, hats, sweatshirts and more featuring the awesome art from Nexus: The Kingdom of the Winds, Dark Ages: Online Roleplaying and Shattered Galaxy to gamers everywhere - just in time for the holiday season. To visit the store, go to the Nexon website at <a href=http://www.nexon.net target=_new> and click "Nexon Store".
